title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, May 16, 2022
description: It's the birthday of writer, historian, and radioman Studs Terkel (1912), whose career was built out of in-depth personal interviews.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of writer, historian, and radioman Studs Terkel (1912), whose career was built out of in-depth personal interviews.
